summary: Adds a summon dremora for novice,apprentice and adept conjuration.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a Dremora summons for novice,apprentice and adept spells which are of course weaker than the dremora lord due to infact that dremora lords are expert conjuration but i also edited the dremora lord so they are useful but not too powerful.

[b]Novice summon:[/b]
Dremora warrior
level 15

[b]Apprentice summon:[/b]
Dremora Barbarian
level 30

[b]Adept summon:[/b]
Dremora Tank
level 45
[b]
Changes to the dremora lord:[/b]
Increased level from 46 to 60

[b]Master summon:[/b]
Dremora god
level 80

All of them has the fire breath shout (cause they are from oblivion/hell right) and added perks.
The spell tomes can be bough once you've reached certain conjuration level.
All of them are 2-handed warrior carrying Daedric greatsword of fire and will also use Daedric bow once the enemy tries to flee.
author: Glen
